title: Shibacals: Shiba Inu’s Innovative Approach to Authenticating Physical Collectibles
description: In a blog post published on Wednesday (21 June 2023), Shiba Inu’s pseudonymous lead developer, Shytoshi Kusama, introduced Shibacals, a novel concept within the Shiba Inu Ecosystem. Shibacals aims to authenticate physical collectibles, bridging the gap between the tangible and digital worlds in a unique way. According to Kusama, the concept of Shibacals is rooted […]

title: Singapore License Propels Ripple into the Billion Dollar Market Arena
description: Ripple, a prominent blockchain company, receives in-principle approval for a Major Payments Institution (MPI) license from the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS). The license empowers Ripple’s Singapore branch to provide regulated digital payment token products and services, paving the way for expanded adoption of its crypto-enabled payment solutions. Ripple Secures Major Payments Institution License in [...]

title: 0.1% Users Affected in the Atomic Wallet Exploit Is a Lie, Says Netizen
description:
After Atomic Wallet released its statement on the June 3rd event, concerns and questions were raised by the Twitter community regarding the recent $35 million crypto heist that brought the multi-currency platform into the spotlight for decentralized wallet security. In the aftermath of the incident, Atomic Wallet tweeted their official statement. They detailed the swift […]
